items.description: Let us know what you need and we'll send your request to local volunteers and organizations.

items.title: Choose Volunteer Offer
items.description: Pick an offer of help from volunteers in your area.

items.title: Coordinate Getting Help
items.description: A volunteer will reach out to you to schedule delivery of your requested items.

items.title: Offer Help
items.description: Let us know what you can help with, and we'll connect you to someone who needs it.

items.title: Choose Who to Help
items.description: Select one or more people in need whose requests you can fulfill.

items.title: Coordinate Helping
items.description: Reach out and coordinate a pickup or delivery of the requested items.

AboutSection.heading: About
AboutSection.subheading: Were a group of volunteers driven to unify help worldwide
AboutSection.paragraph: Meet the minds behind this initiative and join us!

SupportersSection.heading: Supporters
subheading: Thank you to all the companies supporting us on our mission!
In January 2021, Google for Nonprofits granted us $120,000 this year for outreach!

MissionPage.topHeading: We're a group of volunteers driven to unify help worldwide
MissionPage.heading: Our Mission
description: We're a nonprofit democratizing access to volunteer help worldwide. Through technology, were providing quick and easy access to help and resources in your area with local organizations like AIESEC in Portugal, the House of Good Deeds in NYC and more.

With over 300 volunteers in 25 countries and 6 continents, we're connecting communities in need to food banks, charity events, and day-to-day services worldwide. Together, we're building a network of help to keep us stronger and more connected through COVID-19 and beyond.

PartnersSection.heading: Partners
PartnersSection.subheading: Thank you to our volunteer and nonprofit partner organizations helping us build out a network of helpers across the world!

TeamPage.heading: Meet Our Team
description: Hailing from LA to Morocco to Portugal to Bangladesh, were an international collective of volunteers from all walks of life, united to ensure that everyone, everywhere can Reach4Help.
Were looking for volunteer ReactJS developers, marketing/PR strategists and UI/UX designers to help ramp up our efforts supporting communities in need through COVID-19 and future crises to come.

description: You've found a glitch in the matrix...
